Product.name: Cat Butt Tissue Holder
discription: Keep your tissues close at hand with the help of your trusty feline friend.
Measures 12.5 inches long x 9.25 wide, fits standard square tissue boxes.
Each Cat Butt tissue holder is made of molded resin that's easy to clean and designed to last. Hand wash is warm soapy water when needed.

Product.name: A hand squirrel
discription: Your hand will climb trees and forage for nuts
Product.features: You'll forget your hand isn't a real squirrel

Product.name: Human fat
discription: You can now see what your inside is outside
Product.features: If you've ever needed a means of convincing yourself not to go back for seconds, this rubbery pound of replica fat is sure to do the trick

Product.name: Godzilla lawn gnome
discription: This hand-painted ceramic garden gnome statue is made of durable cast poly resin so that it can remain outdoors and withstand the elements all year long
The Great Garden Gnome Massacre statue is not just limited to outdoor spaces.
Small children will run in fear!
Product.features: Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're not welcome

Product.name: Inflatable cat horn
Product.features: You probably already think your cat is quite the unicorn.
